page.title: 17ERITH MARKET
page.content: I go to Erith Market nearly every Saturday. The market sells a lot. It sells fresh fruit, clothes, underwear and bags and jewels mostly. I buy some of my clothes from the market. I bought a flower power suit. Flower power suits are like big pyjamas with flowers on. This is the fashion. Also shoes made out of plastic are in fashion. Something which is in fashion for you hair is lace. It is like netting with patterns on. The market is a bit smelly. The ground always has rubbish on it. The market is held on Wednesdays and Saturdays. You can get chips from the market. These are very hot.
